identity.description:
Retrieve drug names based on abuse and dependence information, including control status, abuse types, and related adverse reactions.

Retrieve the drug name based on information about drug abuse and dependence, including whether the drug is a controlled substances, the types of possible abuse, and adverse reactions relevant to those abuse types.
capabilities: Search drug names by abuse and dependence information
Support pagination via limit and skip parameters

abuse_info.description: Information about drug abuse and dependence.

limit.description: The number of records to return.

skip.description: The number of records to skip.

purpose.model:
SentenceTransformer(
  (0): Transformer({'max_seq_length': 4096, 'do_lower_case': False, 'architecture': 'BertModel'})
  (1): Pooling({'word_embedding_dimension': 384, 'pooling_mode_cls_token': False, 'pooling_mode_mean_tokens': True, 'pooling_mode_max_tokens': False, 'pooling_mode_mean_sqrt_len_tokens': False, 'pooling_mode_weightedmean_tokens': False, 'pooling_mode_lasttoken': False, 'include_prompt': True})
  (2): Normalize()
)
